long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows the user to follow a series of training videos to understand all the DrillPlan workflows during a training session.
The student only needs to be a DELFI registered user and access a DrillPlan training tenant with at least one active subscription (DrillPlan Guest or DrillPlan- Plus). 
You can install this extension if you are a Well Planner or drilling Engineer who wants to participate in a DrillPlan training class.
There is a new feature in this version. Go to your DrillPlan Training Videos Icon, right-click and select "Options" and you can now select either "Onshore" or "Offshore" dataset.
